title: "Permanent return of Mystery Chest"
body: A while ago it said the permanent return of the mystery chest... I self bought a few times and its gone. Its been about 2 weeks. Is this intentional or is this some kind of bug? Or is it permanent return of gifting another player?

replies.body:
The Mystery Chest is permanent, but the the self-gifting of Mystery Chest was only until May 27. 

Official News: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/may-bundles-mystery-skins-and-mystery-chest-returns

Please read.
